name: ASO Research
description: Play Store keyword search with ASOspy overlay: daily installs and app age from work search page.

asospyExtensionPath.description: Path to unpacked ASOspy extension for --load-extension.

chromiumExecutablePath.description: Optional Chromium executable path for extension mode (if Playwright chromium is not installed).

headless.description: Run Chromium headless (default true). Chrome 128+ new headless supports extensions.

playStoreLocale.description: Default hl for Play Store (e.g. en).

overlayTimeoutMs.description: Wait timeout for ASOspy overlay in ms (e.g. 20000).

useWorkSearch.description: Try work search first (default true). If injection fails, falls back to store search.
